00010 #ifndef _ARRAY_LIST_H_
00011 #define _ARRAY_LIST_H_
00012 
00013 template <class T>
00014 class ArrayList {
00015 private:
00016         T *_values;
00017         int _count;
00018         int _capacity;
00019         
00020         void RequireCapacity(int cap)
00021         {
00022                 if (_capacity < cap)
00023                 {
00024                         int capacity = _capacity * 2;
00025                         if (cap > capacity)
00026                                 capacity = cap;
00027                         T* values = new T[capacity];
00028                         for (int i = 0; i < _count; ++i)
00029                                 values[i] = _values[i];
00030                         T* tmp = _values;
00031                         _values = values;
00032                         _capacity = capacity;
00033                         delete[] tmp;
00034                 }
00035         }
00036 
00037 public:
00038         ArrayList() : _values(0), _count(0), _capacity(0)
00039         {
00040         }
00041 
00042         ArrayList(const ArrayList &right) : _values(0), _count(0), _capacity(0)
00043         {
00044                 *this = right;
00045         }
00046 
00047         ~ArrayList() {
00048                 delete[] _values;
00049         }
00050 
00051         ArrayList &operator =(const ArrayList &right)
00052         {
00053                 RequireCapacity(right._count);
00054                 _count = right._count;
00055                 for (int i = 0; i < _count; ++i)
00056                         _values[i] = right._values[i];
00057                 return *this;
00058         }
00059 
00060         const T &operator [](int index) const
00061         {
00062                 return _values[index];
00063         }
00064 
00065         T &operator [] (int index)
00066         {
00067                 return _values[index];
00068         }
00069 
00070         int size() const
00071         {
00072                 return _count;
00073         }
00074 
00075         void push_back(const T &value)
00076         {
00077                 RequireCapacity(_count + 1);
00078                 _values[_count++] = value;
00079         }
00080 
00081         void pop_back()
00082         {
00083                 --_count;
00084         }
00085 
00086         void erase(int index)
00087         {
00088                 for (int i = index; i + 1 < _count; ++i)
00089                         _values[i] = _values[i + 1];
00090                 --_count;
00091         }
00092 
00093         void insert(int index, const T&value)
00094         {
00095                 RequireCapacity(_count + 1);
00096                 for (int i = _count; i > index; --i)
00097                         _values[i] = _values[i - 1];
00098                 _values[index] = value;
00099                 ++_count;
00100         }
00101 
00102         void clear()
00103         {
00104                 _count = 0;
00105         }
00106 };
00107 
00108 #endif //_ARRAY_LIST_H_
